entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH IN EFFECT, St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 31.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines Airport 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 31.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 57 %
Humidex: 41
Dewpoint: 22.1°C
Wind: SW 29 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Showers or thunderstorms. Low 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers with a few thunderstorms beginning early this evening and ending near midnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of severe thunderstorms this evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low 16. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High 22. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 10 September 2016
